basic.description:
A blended online/classroom course that will introduce students to armed forces in modern history, and how they relate to the societies they function within and against.
NOTE    Also offered online. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. Learning Hours may vary.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (12L;24G;12O;72P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: War in Twentieth Century: Myths and Reality

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or above.
Exclusion     No more than 1 course from HIST263; HIST322.
